summary: "Old" is a 2021 American horror mystery movie directed by M. Night Shyamalan. It's about a group of people who start aging quickly while stuck on a remote beach. The film is based on a French graphic novel called "Sandcastle." Shooting took place in the Dominican Republic during the COVID-19 pandemic. The movie stars Gael Garc√≠a Bernal and Vicky Krieps. It made $90 million worldwide and got mixed reviews from critics.
title: Old (film)
